ta.title: சர்வதேச நாணய நிதியத்தின் மூன்றாவது மதிப்பாய்வு குறித்த செய்தி கலந்துரையாடல்

en.title: News discussion on the third review of the IMF

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the news discussion on the third review of the IMF in approximately 200 characters:

"IMF faces criticism over third review. Economists warn of potential economic instability due to strict austerity measures. Developing countries express concerns about inequality and lack of support for growth initiatives."
